content:
Shinhan DSVN Web Mail Instruction 
(This is available only for employees who have been with the company for at least 2 days. You 
may not be able to register an email account on your first working day.)  
 
1. Access website: https://mail.shinhan.com/   
2. Choose ID application  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
3. Fulfill 2 information below:  
● Affiliated Company, choose 신하DS 베트남  
● Employee Number  
 
 
4. Select all the “I agree....” and then select “OK”  
5. Fill in the information to create a webmail  
● ID format email: Lastname.firstnam  (Do not input employee number) 
For exp: Nguyen Van A => a.nguyen or a.nguyenv then “check duplication” (If 
“
Available ID” is okay to continue) 
● Select password  

=> Finish => then you have a webmail  
 
6. Try Login in the 1st time.  
This is your webmail interface
